description: Number of step shifted (decimated) sequence structures using a maximum of three different symbols.
comments: See A056371 for an explanation of step shifts. Permuting the symbols will not change the structure.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
formula: Use de Bruijn's generalization of Polya's enumeration theorem as discussed in reference.
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
